markdown.markdown: ```{=html} ``` ```{r setup, echo=FALSE, output=FALSE} goal_category = params$goal_category data_dir <- "C:/Users/taylo/CPAL Dropbox/Benefits Delivery/04_Projects/WIC/WIC Dashboards/data/scriptData/" files <- list.files(path = data_dir, pattern = "\\.csv$") for (file in files) { file_name <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(file) assign(file_name, read.csv(file = paste0(data_dir, file))) } library(tidyverse) library(googlesheets4) library(tsutils) library(plotly) library(readxl) library(glue) library(stringr) library(waffle) library(forecast) library(tsibble) library(cpaltemplates) library(flexdashboard) library(shiny) library(DT) library(crosstalk) ## make sure poppins is installed locally poppins_import() set_cpal_defaults() bold_color <- function(text, color) { paste0("", text, "") } manager_groups <- clinic_map %>% group_by(Manager) %>% summarise(Clinics = list(Clinic)) ``` # Home ```{=html} ``` ```{r clinic1, echo=FALSE, output=TRUE, results='asis'} #| column: screen-inset-shaded #| layout-nrow: !expr nrow(manager_groups) %/% 3 # for (i in 1:nrow(manager_groups)) { # current_manager <- manager_groups$Manager[i] # current_clinics <- manager_groups$Clinics[[i]] # # df <- data.frame(Clinics = current_clinics) # # print(knitr::kable(df, col.names = NULL, caption = current_manager)) # cat('\n\n\n\n') # } # -
